title: Logging in issue
body:
can anyone not log in?


I just got back in and they said
 " Summoners we are aware of connectivity issues to the platform. We are working to fix the problem as soon as possible"


Riot is Aware of the situation
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/nexW3JsQ-server-issues-4122014

replies.body: how am i supposed to procrastinate now, so selfish rito
Im back in now.
i am still out :/
i am back in but can't connect to chat server and ranked is disabled for me
My promo's just got fked up
Just got back in
got in completely now but friends still cant log

you can all watch this :) 


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SJbwVZJQFKo
yeah, got disconnected mid-champ select. Cannot login whatsoever.
Are they updating or something?

This is funny tho. http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce

No issues, servers are running fine. #NOT
They never admit to the server being down, it's pretty standard
I've never been around for the server to be down until today. I was having a good day as well :( What am I suppose to do in #NSWStorm??? Watch Cat videos on YouTube?
They have been doing live updates for the last 2 days apparently. I know they were rolling out an update in regards to gifting. I think they broke something :(
OCE is down for me too.
Nope, there is an issue
okay thanks
just dropped out of a ranked game and can't log back in, checked my match history and it's been logged as a defeat lel k then rito
am going out into the real world, gg wp
just kidding im in fak u rito
always cant log in , dont know reason

I was disconnected in champ select and couldn't log back in.
When i could i got a warning from the leaver buster system :(
excited to see it come into action not so excited to have it punish me for riot's issue (i'm under the impression its their fault as  i tried to log back in and neither my friend or myself could.  As well as judging from this thread)

I can get in, but I can't connect to chat.
Too scared to start a game...
looks like im going to be forced to play smite with the unbalanced matchmaking D:

> looks like im going to be forced to play smite with the unbalanced matchmaking D:

false alarm, im back on
Hopefully fixing stufferino, if they didnt make an announcement then it should be a quick downtime.
Do you mean "simcity" quick downtime?? or whenever it starts to work downtime

Okay. Good news the server isn't down its just a "connectivity issue"! So I'm sure there are people out there playing when no one can login!

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce

> Network Operations – a few seconds ago
> Summoners we are aware of connectivity issues to the platform. We are working to fix the problem as soon as possible.
That's not good news for the people who can't log in D:
I was being sarcastic. I still can't login! However I can people are online  by looking at the chat thingy ^^^
sorry :/

I've been logged in all day but a few minutes ago people started disappearing from my friend list (As in disconnected) and GD chat.
EDIT: Seems Riot are aware of the issue, there's a notification in client about connectivity issues.
Just got back in Yay :)
I just got back in and they said " Summoners we are aware of connectivity issues to the platform. We are working to fix the problem as soon as possible"
No league tonight Boys, let's pack up and go to sleep early.
Just got back in, chat still disconnected.
gg son
Connection error.
nevermind just got on.
cant log in either
anyone know what's happening?
I thought it was just me, reset my router countless times lol {{champion:25}}  /rageface.
nah still can't log in.
me too
just logged in i couldn't for 20 mins thought
I can't log in either. It has been like this for me for a while now. Maybe a week?
I logged in but after a couple of seconds "disconnected from PvP" I shall now {{summoner:6}} go and cook dinner
I Cant Login time To Do Something Productive For Once
